duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages IT projects from start to finish, including implementation and customizations of software applications, system integrations, software upgrades, and infrastructure projects.
Manages strategic and tactical projects simultaneously, often handling higher-priority projects with complex challenges.
Manages a project team of matrixed resources and reconciles project team time cards and financial forecast.
Prepares project charters, deployment plans, and ensures a smooth transition from development to operations teams.
Monitors and controls project execution phases, prepares project status reports, and meets regularly with stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: PMP Certification in good standing required. Bachelor's degree in related field.
